chapters.title: Introduction to Geography
objectives: Understand the basic concepts of geography
Identify the different types of geographical features

content.objective: Understand the basic concepts of geography
content.data: Geography is the study of places and the relationships between people and their environments...

content.objective: Identify the different types of geographical features
content.data: Geographical features include mountains, rivers, deserts, and oceans...

miscellaneous: Additional information about the history of geography...
